Celestine Donkor bụ onye Ghana na-eti egwu ozioma na onye na-ede egwu. N'onwa Machị 2021, o so na nhọpụta ụmụ nwanyị iri atọ ama ama egwu bụ Top 30 Most Influential Women in Music site na 3Music Awards Women's Brunch Ọ hiwere Celestial Praise, egwu ozioma kwa afọ.

A mụrụ Donkor n'ezinụlọ Maazị na Oriakụ Akakpo, ha abụọ sitere na mpaghara Volta nke Ghana. Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị ya na St Augustine Preparatory school na Abeka Lapaz wee gaa n'ihu na Nsaaniya Secondary Business School na Kasoa ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ọ gara Mahadum nke Ghana, Legon ebe ọ nwetara BA (Hons) Sociology and Information studies.

Donkor na ọtụtụ ndị egwu ozioma, gụnyere Joe Mettle, Joyce Blessing, Ceccy Twum, Mkhululi Bhebhe, Edem, Philipa Baafi, Funny Face. O nwere ọtụtụ egwu , gụnyere "Turning around", "Bigger", "Okronkronhene", "Manim Nguase", "Boobobo". Abọm Agbebolo ya kachasị ọhụrụ mere ka ọ bụrụ onye nka nke afọ na National Gospel Music Awards
Ọ lụrụ Maazị Donkor onye ya na ya mụtara ụmụ nwanyị atọ.
